Welcome to CDE Jewelry
　
♬About CDE:
☞Professional design team & model from Paris
☞Enrolled in Amazon brand registry
☞Stellar Service
　
CDE COMMITS HERSELF TO COLORING YOUR LIFE WITH LOVE
Inspired by nature, civilizations and all the beautiful things in life, CDE Jewelry is designed for the ladies who are dynamic, brave, confident, wise and unique!
Every piece of CDE jewelry was made with exquisite craftsmanship. The detail speaks for itself.
　
♬Austrian Crystals:
CDE purchased genuine Austrian Crystals as raw material and skillfully applied on our own products. This jewelry belongs to CDE.
　
♬Best Choice for Her on:
☞Birthday
☞Mother’s Day
☞Christmas Day
☞Wedding
☞Engagement
☞Anniversary
☞Valentine’s Day
　
♬Care Tips for Your Crystals Jewelry
☞Store your CDE jewelry separately to avoid the scratch.
☞Keep away from chemicals, sweat, bath, crash to avoid any damage.
☞Rub your CDE Jewelry with baby wipes to bring back the shine.


Jewelry itself has no value, but the jewels which can make women shining are priceless! 

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ CDE
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085DDMN7Z

MOTHER’S DAY CHRISTMAS GIFTS FOR WOMEN Comes in a CDE mom jewelry gift box. No wrapping needed. Perfect for gift giving
DESIGN Dark Red heart Crystal wrapped in the angel wing base on which there are many small zircons inlaid. Through such a combination of crystals and zircons, The whole necklace presents the shape of the angel heart.
MATERIALSWhite Gold Plated. Hypoallergenic, Lead-Free, Nickel-Free, passed Swiss SGS Inspection Standard, no harm to health. A+ Stones all appear to be securely set. Embellished with Austrian Crystals are inlaid into the metal by hand, This women gifts for Mothers Day will stay sturdy and not be fell off easily.
SPECIFICATIONS Pendant: 1.45 inch(L)/1.61 inch(H)/0.27 inch(W); Adjustable Chain:16+2 inch; Weight: 0.42 ounces
MATCHING The combination of heart shape crystals add an irresistible sparkle to your daily look. It is a perfect match to evening gown, cocktail dress, wedding dress or blouse and jeans

CDE has its own factory with over 10 years professional experience and lots of jewelry technology patents.

CDE’s vision is bringing the high-quality products and services that exceed our customers' desires.

Each item is a precious artwork！

MAINTENANCE INSTRUCTION

Keep your jewelry in your CDE box at the end of the day.

Do not spray perfume directly on the jewelry

Do not immerse your jewelry in liquid.

After wearing the necklace, wipe it with a soft flannel cloth before putting them away.

Minor tarnish can be lightly buffed off with a jewelry polishing cloth(you can find the cloth in the gift box) or a mild jewelry cleaner.

Details

Mermaid color Heart-shaped stunning and shining crystal wrapped in the Platinum Plated angel wing, glitters and sparkles. The dazzling necklace represents the symbol FOREVER LOVE and the faith of Guardian. Go get wearing it and enjoy the stunning sparkle and all the compliments

Lobster Clasp

Necklace is SEPARATED with the chain so that you could make a change if you'd like to update the collocation and it is adjustable with a chain 17.71 in+1.97 in. No worry about the necklace would not fit

Gift Box

This Angel Wings necklace comes in an elegant jewelry gift box, Great gifts for daughter, gifts for women, gifts for mom, gifts for wife, gifts for aunt, gifts for best friend, etc. Ideal Birthday Gifts, Anniversary Gifts,Christmas Gifts,Thanksgiving gifts, Graduation Gifts, Mother's Day Gifts, Valentine's Day Gifts, etc, or just as a surprise to remind that special one how much you care!

Crystals from Austrian Crystals

These glittering crystals shimmer with the slightest movement and sparkle even in the lowest light settings.

Shining Jewelry Brighten Up Your Brilliant Life

A Romantic and Gorgeous Loving Gift , Keeping those we love close to us, and sharing this good energy and love with others.

Product Description

GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

Ring

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

45+5 cm / 17.7″+2″

Main Stone Quantity：16 Pieces

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：2 mm

Side Stone Quantity:32 Pieces

bracelet Length ：18+3cm/7″+1″

A SPECIAL GIFT FOR A ROMANTIC MOMENT

This teardrop jewelry set is unique and elegant, it is an ideal gift for wife/lover/girlfriend/mother/daughter/friend/sister/bride/bridesmaid and yourself on Anniversaries/Valentine’s Day/Mother’s Day/Birthday/Wedding/Christmas/Thanksgiving Day.

Open/Adjustable Ring

The open ring size can be freely adjusted from size 6 to size 11, you can adjust it until it fits your finger perfectly.

Extended Bracelet

The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).You can make it fit your wrist by attaching and detaching the extension section freely.

Necklace Introduction

The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”, This means you can choose any length between 17.7″-19.7″(45cm-50cm).This necklace is attached with a lobster clasp. It is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely.

Sealed Gift Box

We pack and ship each jewelry set in a sealed jewelry box. It is perfect as a gift to send directly to wife/lover/girlfriend/friend/sister/mom/bride/bridesmaid on anniversary/valentine’s day/birthday/mother’s day/Christmas day

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.15 x 1.97 x 1.02 inches; 1.59 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09PNBZTKP

MATERIAL: This jewelry set is platinum plated alloy, nickel-free, lead-free, non-allergic, and highly polished. The main stone is a 12mm*16mm (pendant) and 10mm*14mm (earrings and ring) waterdrop created-ruby, and the side stones are multiple inlaid round cubic zirconia. The bracelet contains 16 oval created-ruby and 32 round white cubic zirconia.
ABOUT SIZE: The size of the open ring can be adjusted from size6 to size11. The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”(45cm+5cm). The necklace connected by lobster clasp,and it is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely. The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).
ITEMS YOU WILL GET: A ring, a pair of earrings, a pendant and necklace set, a bracelet, and a gift box.
QUALITY ASSURANCE: These jewelry are brand new, and they will be double-checked before sending, we will check every part of the whole set of jewelry to ensure that they are working properly and without any defects. We provide a 60-day unconditional refund service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

GZWHD

From the brand

Founded in 2011, CDE jewelry is a professional jewelry brand seller and manufacturer of necklaces, bracelets, earrings and other fashion jewelry for women.

We have our own factory with over 10 years experiences in designing, manufacturing, packaging and selling jewelry.

Forever Love Heart Necklace

Jewelry Gift Set for Wife

Infinite Love Jewelry

Infinite Love Jewelry

Birthstone Necklaces for Women

Jewelry Set for Women

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 24, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0869BPD69

UNIQUE HEART-SHAPE DESIGN CDE double heart pendant necklaces symbolize love for each other, suitable as Christmas gifts for women, Valentine’s Day gifts, birthday gifts, wedding gifts, anniversary gifts for her/wife/girlfriend/women. The open heart necklace is engraved with “I love you for always and forever”, expressing love for mother, commitment to a loved one or friendship for a confidante.
GEM-QUALITY AAAAA CUBIC ZIRCONIA In the center of the pendant, it is inlaid with a gem-quality 5A cubic zirconia. 5A cubic zirconia is the highest grade in zirconia, which is elaborately selected from the 3A zirconia, with accurate size and cutting, reflecting the dazzling light like a diamond.
THE 12-MONTH BIRTHDAY STONES There are 12 different colors of gemstones, corresponding to the birthstone of each month. You can choose the color according to the birth month. Ruby in July means passion, kindness and dignity. Olivine in August means happiness. Sapphire in September means love, honesty, virtue. Tourmaline in October means joy and peace. Topaz in November means friendship and hope. Tanzanite in December means victory, good luck and success.
SIZE & SERVICE GUARANTEE Pendant Size: 0.83”ⅹ1.02”. Zirconia Size: 0.3”ⅹ0.3”. Chain Length: 17.7”+2”. The pendant necklace comes with an elegant gift box. No wrapping is needed. After-Sale Service: 90 DAYS “NOT ARTIFICIAL DAMAGE” FULL REFUND OR FREE REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE. If there is any problem with our product, don’t hesitate to contact us as soon as possible. We will do our best to satisfy you!

From the brand

IEFIL JEWELRY

Special Gifts for a Special Moment.

IEFIL JEWELRY is a creative jewelry company.

We have our own jewelry designers and factories.

Each jewelry has exquisite packaging and is ready to be given to your loved ones as gifts at any time.

We believe that every piece of jewelry has its own meaning, and they are unique.

ROSE FLOWER GIFTS FOR HER

I LOVE YOU GIFTS FOR HER

Mom Gifts

LOVE GIFTS FOR HER

SISTER GIFTS

DAUGHTER GIFTS

NANA GIFTS

MOM GIFTS

NEW MOM GIFTS

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 9, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B65KC345

GIFTS FOR WOMEN: The dainty heart necklace comes with a beautiful gift box, a gift bag, a round card and an adorable little Envelope, ready for giving. And our packaging is 99% biodegradable. Perfect gifts for your mom, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister, friend on Birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day or other special days.
MATERIALS: The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough to wear for a long time.
SIZE: Chain is 18inches + 2 inches (Adjustable). This length works on practically anyone. It’s a excellent gift choice for women or girls daily wearing home or office.
AFTER – SALES SERVICE: We are committed to providing a 90-day refund service. If you are interested in or question the birthstone necklace, please contact us in time. We will reply you within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory answer.

BEST GIFTS FOR WOMEN


I LOVE YOU FOR ALWAYS & FOREVER

Birthstone Necklace for Women

GIFTS FOR WOMEN

Unique necklace send to the special women in your life and let her know how much she means to you. At the center of the heart pendant is a birthstone and it represents the month of her birth. When she wear this heart pendant necklace, she genuinely happy for this little surprise. Perfect gifts for your mom, grandma, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister or any other awesome lady on Birthday, Mother’s Day, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary or other special days.



925 Sterling Silver

DAINTY NECKLACES FOR WOMEN

The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough and will not break.

  1. January-April

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Garnet in January means Chastity, Friendship, Fidelity.
    • Amethyst in February means Chastity, Courage, Honesty.
    • Aquamarine in March means Composure, Courage, Happiness.
    • White Topaz in April means Firm and Eternal Love.


  2. May-August

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Emerald in May means Kindness, Confidence, Kindness, Happiness.
    • Alexandrite in June means Healthy and long life.
    • Ruby in July means Love, Passion, Radiance.
    • Peridot In August removes people’s fears and gives the wearer a happy marriage.


  3. September-December

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Sapphire in September means Loyalty, Steadfastness, Love and Honesty.
    • Pink Sapphire in October means strong.
    • Citrine in November means Sincere and Friendly.
    • Tanzanite in December means joyful.


Buyer Show


Is it made cheaply or is it high quality?

The pendant and chain of this necklace are made of 925 sterling silver, high quality.

What if my necklace breaks?

In the case of non-human intentional damage, your necklace has a broken chain or faded pendant, please let us know and we will send you a new necklace as compensation.

How can I take care of my necklace?

1.Try not to leave the necklace in the water for a long time

2.Do not wear the necklace for strenuous exercise, sweat will reduce the life of the necklace.

3.When you are not wearing it, please wipe it with a soft cloth and store it in a jewelry box.

What is this package?

The birthstone necklace comes with an IEFIL gift bag, an IEFIL jewelry box, a little envelopes, a thank you card and a silver polishing cloth. Ready for give as a gift.

About IEFIL JEWELRY?

IEFIL JEWELRY is a creative jewelry company and we have our own jewelry designers and factories.

Welcome to join us, we are glad to see you share your valuable suggestions about our products.
